questions.quote: It's okay. You know, I totally understand, alright? You guys, make way more sense than her and I ever did, you know. And... I want you to be happy.
What? Uhh, Phoebe, honey, honey, I know you're quirky and I get a big kick out of it, we all do actually, but if you destroy a coat like this that is like a crime against nature! Not nature, fashion!
Right, will you excuse us for one moment? What are you doing?
Well maybe you can date him then that would save me the trouble of killing him. Are you okay?
Y'know what, this is obviously some kind of twisted joke she's trying to play on him.
Joey, I gotta tell ya, I've been thinking all day about that scene you did, I mean, you were amazing!
All right listen umm, I just bought something I'm not sure she's gonna like it, and it's gonna seem a little crazy, but this is something that I wanted since I was a little girl.
I'm sorry, you know, maybe I wasn't being clear. Uh, this is our cart.
Well, you know, there's no one way really, it's just, you know, whatever it takes so that you can finally say to him, "I'm over you."
No, see, I'm trying this new screening thing. You know, I figure if I'm always answering the phone, people'll think I don't have a life. My god, Rodrigo never gets pinned.
